settings.text: WE GIVE AWAY 2 TRIPS TO LAS VEGAS EVERY YEAR!

settings.heading: You currently are not entered to win

settings.text:
When you purchase on Amazon or other marketplaces, your order isn't counted as an entry to our Las Vegas Giveaway! Every order placed on DegenHealth.com is an entry to win a trip for 2 to Las Vegas, round trip airfare and 5 star hotel included. Get all the details on this page, below the sign up area.

As a welcome gift, we're offering you 25% off your first order on our website. This order will count as an entry for our Las Vegas giveaway, unlike orders placed on other online marketplaces.

settings.custom_liquid:
Enter your phone number below to save 25%!

Free Shipping on Orders Over $40!

*By subscribing, you agree to receive recurring automated marketing text messages (e.g. cart reminders) at the phone number provided. Consent is not a condition to purchase. Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help and STOP to cancel. View our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Thanks for subscribing! We'll send you a message shortly.

settings.heading: Whats the catch?
settings.row_content: The only catch is you have to make at least one purchase on our website. If your email is in our customer database on Shopify, you are entered to win. Orders placed on other marketplaces, or via retail, are not enteries to win this giveaway.

settings.heading: Are customers able to have multiple entries?
settings.row_content: Yes. The more purchases you make, the more entries to the contest you have.

settings.heading: How will the winner be notified?
settings.row_content: The winner will be notified via email on our announcement dates. (July 4th, January 1st.)

settings.heading: When will the winner be announced?
settings.row_content: July 4th for spring/summer contest, and January 1st for fall/winter contest.

settings.heading: What exactly is included if you win?
settings.row_content: Round trip airfare for 2 from anywhere in the continental USA, 2 nights in a 5 star hotel/casino on The Strip. (Bellagio, Cosmopolitan, Etc. - No BS off strip hotels)

settings.heading: Are there blackout dates for when you can take your trip?
settings.row_content: Yes. We can't afford to send you on holidays or big conference weekends. No observed holidays, no big conference weeks like Affiliate Summit, CES, or AVN. No Super Bowl week. No NHL/NBA Finals. No World Series. No March Madness. Capish? ðŸ˜‰

settings.heading: How will you plan your trip?
settings.row_content: You will work with the Founder of Degen Health, Morty, to plan your weekend. You will give Morty dates that work for you, Morty will look into the best available options in Vegas for said dates, and present them to you. This will all be done via email. From there, you will need to share your information for booking a domestic flight and hotel via email, and voila! You're booked for a free weekend in VEGAS.

settings.heading: What isn't included?
settings.row_content: The costs associated with your inevitable #DegenBehavior in Vegas are not covered. Though, with the flights and hotel being free, the winner should make an effort to send it and go full #Degen.
